unnormalised: Breaking News: Office Chaos Ensues as Time Zone Confusion Grips Global Teams!
normalised: Breaking News: Office Chaos Ensues as Time Zone Confusion Grips Global Teams!

unnormalised: Bhangar khabar: Global teams-anche time zone confusion-ak lagun office-ant gondoll!
normalised: Reports bhartantlean yetat Bharotleantlea kampaninkantlean zashi kamdhiari lok international sangatim sangatuk korpak tras bhogtathi. Gunhegar konn? Time zones, te trasdeak disnaat ashille lini ze thartat kdhaa ami ek mhatvachi zoom call divoonk shaktaa nam. Ek vishesh hanspa-aashel ghatna Priya Sharma Mumbaik aslileenne New Yorkantle client sangatim melchhi yevzilayli, punn taka dislem ki "prepone" kaay arth nakho karak, kdhaa client kharook sukondla. Melchhi, pratham char P-M I-S-T (Bharatiy Pramanit Time) vorank yevzilayli, don A-M E-S-T (Eastern Pramanit Time) vorank punarvyavastith zali. Priya-ne email vaparnookh vichar kelo.

unnormalised: Bharotantle company-antle karmachari aplea international sangateanchea sangata zait dukh bhogtat asat, ashe reports yetat. Hachem karonn? Time zones, te adrushya linio zeka amhi zoom call kad'dyak yevchek yetam (vo yetchok na). Eka khass majeshi ghodonuk Priya Sharma, Mumbai-n tichea New York-chea client-ak melpak zoi, pun tinka kolle "prepone" konnekuch arth sarthak korpak na, karonn client tor nijdin asat.  Mellop, suruvaatich 4 PM IST (Bharotacha Pramannik Vel) astan, 2 AM EST (Eastern Standard Time) kela. Priya-n chaturpanan email vaparla.
normalised: Tech support team overtime kaam karta U-T-C (Coordinated Universal Time) chintnam samzhaunk - ya samzhaunk prayatn kartat. Satya sanglya, Albert Einstein soddank apaanh dhakhi ghaltelkdhaak tharhaavlikit kdhaa khaan kaim zagi plus panch colon tiss G-M-T athvaa kaim zagi minus aath G-M-T. Ek I-T kamdhiar T-C-S, Delhitlenni, hanspa-aashel ki az taka P-h-D Time Zone Management-intli, teen voram Londonantle ek tras bhogte ashe manager-k samzaunk ghalun kdhaa farak ashtthi.

unnormalised: Tech support teams UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) explain korpak raat dis kam kortat - vo explain karpak prayatna kortat. Sat sangam, Albert Einstein-ui chuklo asto kashik kiteak konnichi jaganchi +5:30 GMT ani konnichi -8 GMT asat. TCS, Delhi-chea eka IT kamgarin mazak keli tanen apleak Time Zone Management-ant PhD asa, 3 hours vaprun London-antle eka confused manager-ak samzayk diunek fer badal sangun.
normalised: Mul kaaran? Daylight Saving Time, tem varshi yevzilayllam vidhi zaati ghari pudden ani piche gheta, khaan trasdhi ani astitvachi darar vapron. Ek tweet vachpak ailem, "Kdlhyaank aakra A-M athvaa barah P-M? Muje dokle dukhthele. Dhanyavad, D-S-T!" spasht zashi tras asli. Experts suchavta ek global summit kadunk ek standart time zone vicharunk. Bareh tharhaavo, punn ami sakal zamta kdhaa global summit ketlenk zata!

unnormalised: Hachem mukhel karann? Daylight Saving Time, ti varshiki riti jeka ghadyale fuddem vo pachchim vhalitat, lokanchi bhok marun ani duk-ant ghaltat. Ek tweet ashi ach, "Sakalchea 11 vazlea mhunnchi vo 12? Mojen mathem dukhon. Dhanyavaad, DST!" Sachinuch, dukh khari. Experts ek global summit suchoitat ek promannik time zone-acho vishayacher ulop korpak. Subhechha tumkank, pun amkak tor khabar asa kashe global summits zatat!
normalised: Sambandit bhartanantim, astrologer lodpak laglet ek vadhti sallatlean. Spasht zashi taraa-challe samadhan ataa dos dilet zashi samadhan vaityalyaa sheduleak ani late kadhi-dinyak. Zaati tukle boss ekdum deri zaat melkyak, taka dos nakho din - Mercury retrograde (ani te dar time zones!) dosa din. Amlle zamta ek dya desert island zaka time zones natsa. Vachak, aashya zagek asli kdhaa?

unnormalised: Jodleli khabar mhunnje, astrologers aplea consultations-ant vad zatat mhunn sangtat. Distai, mismanaged schedules ani missed deadlines-anche dosh grahanche thaikar dharta. Mhunnche, tumcho boss deran mellpak yeta mhunnche tancho dosh naka ghalunk - grahanchi dukan ghalum (ani tea time zones-anchi!). Samkum amhi soglle ek desert island-ak vhochum jiak time zones-uch nastat. Raat, ashi zaga asli kiteak?
